_sText:
A picture is worth 1000 words and a movie is worth alot more
<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/9asSjk6jG1E&hl=en&fs=1&color1=0x006699&color2=0x54abd6"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/9asSjk6jG1E&hl=en&fs=1&color1=0x006699&color2=0x54abd6" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="275" height="250"></embed></object>

This is a South Park Map i have been working on for a week i have made all the textures myself i got the house ideas from Fy south park and the TV show and the bus was made by JasenM i just retextured it and sleigh was by robin witch the sleigh is drivable now and i added the basket ball court for the high school musical episode and i still need to add a couple more rooms but they will be in my next release. its a great map and the people on my server love it its a big download though all the texture files i put into it with pakrat but its will worth the download please post what u think i should add and rate it GOOD =D

there are 40 spawn 20 t and 20 ct
------Soon to come-------
+ Mr. Mankeys office 
+ Bath rooms
+ windows on the back side of the houses
+ a kill kenny thing on a wall
+ some of the suggestion i get from people if they post them below
-----Credits-------
Robin-- the sleigh that i made drivable
JasenM--Sweet buss prefab
